revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_BrainExplode}} {{doomwiki|A_BrainExplode}} '''A_BrainExplode'''
(no parameters)
Spawns one element of the [[Classes:BossBrain|brain]] explosion (see [[A_BrainScream]]).
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's Icon of Sin.
Death: BBRN A 100 [[A_BrainScream]] BBRN AA 10 BBRN A -1 [[A_BrainDie]] Stop
{{DEFAULTSORT:BrainExplode}}[[category:Decorate Classic attack functions]][[Category:Icon of Sin]]
